contest-event.event-date:
June 23, 2019 D Bernisches Kantonal-Musikfest (Marschmusik)
Bernisches Kantonal-Musikfest (Marschmusik) 60 March Contest Bernisches Kantonal-Musikfest bernisches-kantonal-musikfest-marschmusik
Switzerland
Thun (City&Elect. District), BE, Switzerland > held on Weekends of June 15th & 16th and 22th & 23th
Adjudicators W1: Fellay, Kern, Speck Adjudicators W2: Fellay, Rütsche, Speck
151 Bands (separate Ranking for each Section 1st - 4th & Brass/Wind and also 5 Bands with Evolutions; 1st Weekend Draws till 37 played on June 15th and then till 61 on Sunday; 2nd Weekend till 113 on June 22th and finally till 151 on Sunday)
Bands preparded 2 Marches: Just before Marching the Jury decided which one to play > thanks for Info about Marches played!
March 19, 2017, 6:46 p.m. June 16, 2020, 8:12 a.m.
1 Brass Band MG Reiden Roland Fröscher March: General Guisan-Marsch
2 Brass Band Kirchenmusik Flühli Armin Renggli March: Punchinello
3 BB Frohsinn Grosswangen Roman Brogli
4 Regional Brass Band Bern Manuel Renggli
5 Brass Band Berner Oberland Junior Jan Müller
Unknown Result Brass Band Mittelhäusern Heinz Mäder
Unknown Result MG Oberdiessbach Balz Graber
Unknown Result Musikgesellschaft Rumisberg Fabian Brudermann
Unknown Result Musikgesellschaft Geuensee Reto Tschopp
